description:
11.141 lagfun
Slowly update darker pixels.

This filter makes short flashes of light appear longer.
This filter accepts the following options:
name: lagfun

parameters.description: Set factor for decaying. Default is .95. Allowed range is from 0 to 1.
parameters.name: decay

parameters.description: Set which planes to filter. Default is all. Allowed range is from 0 to 15.
parameters.name: planes

source:
11.141 lagfun

Slowly update darker pixels.

This filter makes short flashes of light appear longer. This filter accepts the following options:

decay

Set factor for decaying. Default is .95. Allowed range is from 0 to 1.

planes

Set which planes to filter. Default is all. Allowed range is from 0 to 15.
